name: Ms. Splosion Man
summary:
You got a problem? Yo, she’ll splode it. At the Big Science after-party celebrating the capture of Splosion Man, a spill of champagne shorts out the safety protocols on the splosionatrix and from it emerges Ms. Splosion Man. The latest creation from Twisted Pixel Games, the creators of Splosion Man, The Maw, and Comic Jumper, Ms. Splosion man comes packed with fifty levels of single player and a separate fifty level co-op multiplayer campaign. 
 
Expanded map features, tons of unlockables, ghost replays, and countless other improvements make this the definitive edition for any splosion connoisseur.

esrb.synopsis: This is an action platformer in which players control a scientifically altered woman who can cause explosions with her body. Players' objective is to save the original "Splosion Man" from evil scientists. Ms. Splosion Man runs through levels while triggering fiery explosions in front of scientists and giant robot creatures. When enemies explode, they generally turn into "cartoony" chunks of meat (i.e., hams, sausages, turkey legs, hot dogs). During the course of the game, a boss creature is depicted with exaggerated-sized breasts that sometimes jiggle; Ms. Splosion Man sometimes makes suggestive comments during gameplay (e.g., "Like a virgin, wooo," "Vajazzled," "Not tonight, I have a headache."). Song lyrics also contain some suggestive material (e.g., ". . . big round mounds, then boom/Shake your rump to the sweet sound" and "[Y]our rump is looking dandy . . . You're making me feel so randy"). In the opening tutorial, a voiceover jokes about a player's hands twitching "like a heroin junkie."

pegi.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 12 years and over only.
It contains: Non realistic looking violence towards human characters
This game allows the player to interact with other players ONLINE
